languages.text: Конечная фаза движения корабля, обозначаемая сплошной заливкой области движения. Закончить ход в космическом бою, как правило, можно только когда корабль достигнет фазы завершения.
The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.
languages.original_text: Конечная фаза движения корабля, обозначаемая сплошной заливкой области движения. Закончить ход в космическом бою, как правило, можно только когда корабль достигнет фазы завершения.

traits.locale_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-colour area. Generally a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.
The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-colour area. Generally a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.
The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.
The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.
The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.

languages.text: Die letzte Phase der Schiffsbewegung, die durch den einfarbigen Bereich gekennzeichnet ist. In der Regel kann ein Schiff seine Bewegung erst beenden, wenn es die Endbewegungszone erreicht hat.
languages.original_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text: Die letzte Phase der Schiffsbewegung, die durch den einfarbigen Bereich gekennzeichnet ist. In der Regel kann ein Schiff seine Bewegung erst beenden, wenn es die Endbewegungszone erreicht hat.

languages.text: La phase finale de déplacement du vaisseau est représentée par une zone de couleur unie. En général, un vaisseau ne peut terminer son déplacement qu'après avoir atteint la zone de fin de déplacement.
languages.original_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text: La phase finale de déplacement du vaisseau est représentée par la zone de couleur unie. En général, un vaisseau ne peut terminer son déplacement qu'après avoir atteint la zone de fin de déplacement.

languages.text: 纯色区域表示舰船航行的最后阶段。一般情况下，舰船只有抵达终点区域之后才能结束回合。
languages.original_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text: 纯色区域表示舰船航行的最后阶段。一般情况下，舰船只有抵达终点区域之后才能结束回合。

languages.text: La fase final del movimiento de la nave, indicada por la zona de color sólido. Por lo general, la nave solo puede detener su movimiento al llegar a la zona de movimiento final.
languages.original_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text: La fase final del movimiento de la nave, indicada por la zona de color sólido. Por lo general, la nave solo puede detener su movimiento al llegar a la zona de movimiento final.

languages.original_text: The final phase of a ship's movement, indicated by a solid fill of the movement area. You can usually end a turn in space combat only when the ship reaches the End Phase.

languages.text: 船の移動の最終段階は色のついた領域で示されている。通常、船は動作停止ゾーンに到達してからしか移動を終えることはできない。
languages.original_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.

traits.locale_text: 船の移動の最終段階は色のついた領域で示されている。通常、船は動作停止ゾーンに到達してからしか移動を終えることはできない。

languages.text: Geminin hareketinin son evresi, dolgun renkli alanla belirtilir. Genelde bir gemi hareketini ancak son hareket bölgesine ulaştıktan sonra sonlandırabilir.
languages.original_text: The final phase of the ship's movement denoted by the solid-coloured area. Generally, a ship can only end its movement after it has reached the end movement zone.
